# Feature Specification

**Status:** Planned
**Version:** 1.0

## Overview

This is a sample feature specification for testing.

## Requirements

### Section 1: Core Functionality

- [ ] Implement basic functionality
- [ ] Add error handling
- [ ] Write tests

### Section 2: Integration

- [ ] Connect to external service
- [ ] Handle API responses

## Implementation Notes

The feature MUST handle errors gracefully.
The feature SHOULD support multiple formats.
